page.title: 04Farming
page.content: { {Dairy House Farm} The farm is about 150 acres and is owned by{Mr.Lloyd.}It has a herd of 40 cows and 20 calves. The machinery includes{three {tractors,silage trailers and {cutters,}milking parlour and a boiler. In summer the cattle graze in the fields but in winter when the grass stops growing they are fed on fodder crops.The farm makes hay and silage for fodder,straw is also used for fodder.Most of the milk produced is sold to the Milk Marketing Board or used for dairy products such as yoghurt and cheesecakes in "Pru's Dairy".Pru Lloyd used to have a workshop on the farm but now the business has expanded and she rents a purpose built factory in nearby Weobley.
